task: Develop a basic 'Bejeweled' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Emphasize differences'.
name: Contrast Cascade

branding_data.short_description: Contrast Cascade is a unique twist on the classic match-3 puzzle game, where players must focus on contrasting elements to progress.
branding_data.detailed_description: Contrast Cascade takes the familiar mechanics of a 'Bejeweled' game and adds a fresh twist by emphasizing differences. In this vibrant and visually striking puzzle game, players are challenged not only to match gems of the same type but to also focus on creating chains based on contrasting features such as color, shape, or texture. The game encourages strategic thinking as players must balance between matching similar gems and highlighting their differences to trigger special combos and unlock powerful abilities. With dynamic levels and evolving challenges, Contrast Cascade offers a refreshing and engaging experience for puzzle enthusiasts.
